text: al-rijalu qawwamuna ʿala l-nisai bima faddala l-lahu baʿdahum ʿala baʿdin wabima anfaqu min amwalihim fal-salihatu qanitatun hafizatun lil'ghaybi bima hafiza l-lahu wa-allati takhafuna nushuzahunna faʿizuhunna wa-uh'juruhunna fi l-madajiʿi wa-id'ribuhunna fa-in ataʿnakum fala tabghu ʿalayhinna sabilan inna l-laha kana ʿaliyyan kabiran
